Rule.Description: See if there are any refs for ImageId to a parameter of inappropriate type. Appropriate Types are [AWS::EC2::Image::Id, AWS::SSM::Parameter::Value<AWS::EC2::Image::Id>]

Rule.Description: Check if a parameter is being used as a CIDR. If it is make sure it has allowed values regex comparisons

Message: AllowedPattern and/or AllowedValues for Parameter should be specified at Parameters/pManagementCIDR. Example for AllowedPattern: "^(([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])\.){3}([0-9]|[1-9][0-9]|1[0-9]{2}|2[0-4][0-9]|25[0-5])(\/([0-9]|[1-2][0-9]|3[0-2]))$"
